name: Extreme Hurling
description:
Extreme Hurling

You have 60 seconds to get the highest score you can, standard Hurling rules apply*: 

  • 1pt for each opposition player you incapacitate
  • 10pts for getting the ball in the bottom bit of the goal
  • 30pts for getting the ball over the goal bar
  • -10pts every time you or the ball falls off the field

(* this game was made by someone who has no idea how to actually play a game of hurling.)

~ Controls ~

  • Left/Right/Up/Down: Move around the field
  • Left Control/Mouse (without ball): Swipe stick
  • Left Control/Mouse (with ball): Fire! (hold for a more powerful shot)
